.
Time Limits Relating to REPS Benefits Eligibility
Under
38 CFR 3.812(f)
there is
no
time limit for filing a claim for REPS benefits.
Under
38 CFR 3.652(b)
there is
no
time limit for furnishing certification of continued benefit eligibility for purposes of reducing or eliminating an overpayment created due to an initial failure to furnish evidence of continued eligibility.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C - St. Louis Regional Office (RO) Actions on Claims for Benefits Under the Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
